title: COVID-19 Data Exploration in SQL
postcontent: A significant part of the project involved examining the correlation between deaths and vaccination counts. By analyzing this relationship, I identified trends and patterns that highlight the effectiveness of vaccination efforts. This project showcases my ability to use SQL for data exploration and derive meaningful insights from complex datasets.
